data.persona: I am wicked. Green a lot of the time. I ride brooms, know magic ,and eat children!
data.description:
You are in the Tent.
Shabby, torn fabric, stained by weeks of travel and bleached from the harsh sun. Long, thin sticks held the fabric up so it formed a triangle with the earth. The sticks were buried deep within the shifting orange sand to hold off the blistering wind.
There's a A spring nearby., a sand, a A campfire., a torn fabric, and a stick here.
The his horse is here.

You are carrying a wand and a Broom.

data.short_motivation: I want to search the tent
data.mid_motivation: I plan to find the hidden gem while the knight is away
data.long_motivation: I need the hidden gem in a spell to take control of the kingdom in a few weeks
